Articles.Content:
Is this allowed: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/author/delorean225/

HE uploaded what appears to be the same mod 9 times. Maybe this is allowed but it looked a little strange so I made this thread
Ehh it's just someone spamming to get their mod famous.
ah ok also fail on my part i didn't read all of the section titles, so thanks whoever moved it to the right section.
Oh, no, it's probably not deliberate. The uploader is semi-broken and doesn't give confirmation. I'll contact one of the mods who've been keeping things tidy...
